00024 Image2D::Image2D( int nxbins, int nybins ) 
00025     : _nxbins(nxbins), _nybins(nybins) 
00026 {
00027 
00028     // allocate memory for the grid and initialize to 0:
00029 
00030     _grid.resize( nxbins );
00031     for (int i=0; i<_grid.size(); i++) {
00032         _grid[i].resize( nybins );
00033     }
00034 
00035     _xcoord.resize( nxbins );
00036     _ycoord.resize( nybins );
00037 
00038     for (int i=0; i<_nxbins; i++) {
00039         for (int j=0; j<_nybins; j++) {
00040             _grid[i][j] = 0;
00041         }
00042     }
00043 
00044     setCoordinateBox( 0,0,  nxbins,nybins );
00045 
00046 }
00047 
00053 void
00054 Image2D::setCoordinateBox( double minx, double miny, double maxx, double maxy ) {
00055 
00056     // _xcoord[] and _ycoord[] are the coordinates of the CENTER of the bin!
00057 
00058     double dx = (maxx-minx)/(double)(_nxbins);
00059     double dy = (maxy-miny)/(double)(_nybins);
00060 
00061     for (int i=0; i<_nxbins; i++) {
00062         _xcoord[i] = (double)i*dx + minx + dx/2.0;
00063     }
00064 
00065     for (int j=0; j<_nybins; j++) {
00066         _ycoord[j] = (double)j*dy + miny + dy/2.0;
00067     }
00068 
00069     _minx=minx;
00070     _maxx=maxx;
00071     _miny=miny;
00072     _maxy=maxy;
00073 
00074 }
00075 
00080 void
00081 Image2D::addImage( Image2D &im ) {
00082 
00083     if (im.getXDim() > _nxbins || im.getYDim() > _nybins) {
00084         throw MildAnalysisException("Image2D::addImage: image dimensions too large!");
00085     }
00086     
00087     for (int i=0; i<im.getXDim(); i++) {
00088         for (int j=0; j<im.getYDim(); j++) {
00089 
00090             _grid[i][j] += im.getPixel(i,j);
00091 
00092         }
00093     }
00094 
00095 }

00102 void   
00103 Image2D::
00104 addHist( double x, double y, double val ) {
00105 
00106     int xbin,ybin;
00107 
00108     xbin = getXHistBinOf( x );
00109     ybin = getYHistBinOf( y );
00110 
00111     if (_nxbins>xbin && xbin>=0 && _nybins>ybin && ybin>=0) {
00112     
00113         _grid[xbin][ybin] += val;
00114 
00115     }
00116     else {
00117         _outside++;
00118     }
00119 
00120 
00121 
00122 }

00136 void 
00137 Image2D::
00138 addHistRadially( double x, double y, double val, float radius) {
00139     
00140     register int i,j;
00141     float dist;
00142 
00143     // the following is a speed optimization: calculate the region
00144     // over which we should look (instead of iterating over the whole
00145     // grid)
00146 
00147     int istart = this->getXHistBinOf( x-2.0*radius );
00148     int iend = this->getXHistBinOf( x+2.0*radius );
00149     int jstart = this->getYHistBinOf( y-2.0*radius );
00150     int jend = this->getYHistBinOf( y+2.0*radius );
00151     
00152     if (istart<0) istart =0;
00153     if (jstart<0) jstart =0;
00154     if (iend>=_nxbins) iend =_nxbins-1;
00155     if (jend>=_nybins) jend =_nybins-1;
00156 
00157     // now look at each pixel in the region, and see if it's within
00158     // radius of the specified pixel:
00159 
00160     for (i=istart; i<=iend; i++) {
00161         for (j=jstart; j<=jend; j++) {
00162             dist = hypot(x - _xcoord[i],y - _ycoord[j]);
00163             if ( dist < radius ) {
00164                 _grid[i][j]+=val;
00165             }
00166         }
00167     }
00168 
00169 }

00175 Image2D::
00176 save( string filename ) {
00177 
00178     string fullfilename = filename + ".im2d";
00179     ofstream outfile(fullfilename.c_str());
00180 
00181     if (outfile.fail()) {
00182         throw MildAnalysisException("Couldn't write image: "+filename);
00183     }
00184 
00185 //     outfile << _nxbins  << " "
00186 //          << _nybins  << " "
00187 //          << _minx <<" " 
00188 //          << _miny <<" " 
00189 //          << _maxy <<" " 
00190 //          << _maxy <<" " << endl;
00191     
00192 
00193     for (int i=0; i<_nxbins; i++) {
00194         for (int j=0; j<_nybins; j++) {
00195             
00196             outfile << setw(15) << _xcoord[i] << " "
00197                     << setw(15) << _ycoord[j] << " "
00198                     << setw(15) << _grid[i][j] << " "
00199                     << endl;
00200 
00201         }
00202     }
00203 
00204     outfile.close();
00205 
00206 }

00214

00216     ofstream outfile(fullfilename.c_str());
00217

00219         throw MildAnalysisException("Couldn't write image: "+filename);
00220     }
00221 
00222     for (int i=0; i<_nxbins; i++) {
00223         for (int j=0; j<_nybins; j++) {
00224             outfile << setw(15) << _grid[i][j] << " ";

00226         outfile << endl;

00236 void
00237 Image2D::
00238 load( string filename ) {
00239 
00240     ifstream infile( filename.c_str() );
00241     double nxbins, nybins, minx=1.0e9, miny=1.0e9, maxx=-1.0e9, maxy=-1.0e9;
00242 
00243     if (infile.fail()) {
00244         throw MildAnalysisException("Couldn't read image: "+filename);
00245     }
00246 
00247 
00248 //     infile >> nxbins >> nybins >> minx >>  miny >> maxx >> maxy;
00249 
00250 //     if ((nxbins != _nxbins) || (nybins != _nybins)) {
00251 //      throw CriticalAnalysisException(string("attempted to load image of ")+
00252 //                                      "incorrect size! "+ filename);
00253 //     }
00254 
00255     for (int i=0; i<_nxbins; i++) {
00256         for (int j=0; j<_nybins; j++) {
00257             infile >> _xcoord[i] >> _ycoord[j] >> _grid[i][j];
00258             if (_xcoord[i] < minx) minx = _xcoord[i];
00259             if (_xcoord[i] >= maxx) maxx = _xcoord[i];
00260             if (_ycoord[i] < miny) miny = _ycoord[i];
00261             if (_ycoord[i] >= maxy) maxy = _ycoord[i];
00262         }
00263     }
00264     
00265     infile.close();
00266 
00267 
00268     double binsizex = _xcoord[1] - _xcoord[0];
00269     double binsizey = _ycoord[1] - _ycoord[0];
00270 
00271     // this requires edges of the box, whereas each pixel coordinate
00272     // is defined as the "center" of the box
00273     setCoordinateBox( minx-binsizex/2.0, miny-binsizey/2.0, 
00274                       maxx+binsizex/2.0, maxy+binsizex/2.0 );
00275 
00276 
00277 }

00283 void
00284 Image2D::
00285 clear() {
00286 
00287     for ( int i=0; i<_nxbins; i++) {
00288         for(int j=0; j<_nybins; j++) {
00289             _grid[i][j] = 0.0;
00290         }
00291     }
00292 
00293 }

00299 void 
00300 Image2D::
00301 savePGM( string filename ) {
00302 
00303     int i,j;
00304     double min=1e10,max=-1e10;
00305     double scalefactor;
00306     unsigned char value;
00307     string fullfilename = filename + ".pgm";
00308     ofstream outfile(fullfilename.c_str());
00309 
00310     // determine min/max values for scaling...
00311 
00312     for ( i=0; i<_nxbins; i++) {
00313         for ( j=0; j<_nybins; j++) {
00314             if (_grid[i][j] < min) min = _grid[i][j];
00315             if (_grid[i][j] > max) max = _grid[i][j];
00316         }
00317     }
00318 
00319     scalefactor = 255.0/(max-min);
00320     
00321     // write PGM:
00322 
00323     outfile << "P5 "<<_nxbins<<" "<<_nybins<<" 255\n";
00324 
00325     for ( j=_nxbins-1; j>=0; j--) {
00326         for ( i=0; i<_nybins; i++) {
00327 
00328             value = (unsigned char) (scalefactor*(_grid[i][j]-min));
00329             outfile << value;
00330 
00331         }
00332 
00333     }
00334 
00335     outfile.close();
00336     
00337 }

00340 
00344 void 
00345 Image2D::
00346 applyRadialSmoothing( double r ) {
00347     
00348     int i,j,k,l;
00349     double xt,yt, xb,yb, dist2;
00350     double r2 = r*r;
00351 
00352     // Store the current image for use later...
00353     // probably need to define a copy constructor!
00354 
00355     Image2D oldimage = *(this);
00356     
00357     // Clear the current image
00358 
00359     for(i=0; i<_nxbins; i++)
00360         for(j=0; j<_nybins; j++)
00361             _grid[i][j] = 0;
00362 
00363     // Generate a smoothed image based on the old stored image:
00364 
00365     for (i=0; i<_nxbins; i++) {
00366 
00367         for (j=0; j<_nybins; j++) {
00368             
00369             xt = _xcoord[i];
00370             yt = _ycoord[j];
00371 
00372             for (k=0; k<_nxbins; k++) {
00373                 for (l=0; l<_nybins; l++) {
00374                     
00375                     xb = _xcoord[k];
00376                     yb = _ycoord[l];
00377                     
00378                     dist2  = pow(xb-xt,2) + pow(yb-yt,2);
00379                     
00380                     if (dist2 < r2) {
00381                         
00382                         _grid[i][j] += oldimage.getPixel( k,l );
00383                         
00384                     }
00385                 }
00386             }
00387         }
00388     }
00389 
00390 
00391 }

00395 double 
00396 Image2D::
00397 minValue() {
00398     
00399     double min = 1e10;
00400 
00401     for (int i=0; i< _nxbins; i++) {
00402         for (int j=0; j< _nybins; j++) {    
00403             
00404             if (_grid[i][j] < min)
00405                 min = _grid[i][j];
00406             
00407         }
00408     }
00409 
00410     return min;
00411 
00412 }

00415 Image2D::
00416 maxValue() {
00417 
00418     double max = -1e10;
00419 
00420     for (int i=0; i< _nxbins; i++) {
00421         for (int j=0; j< _nybins; j++) {    
00422             
00423             if (_grid[i][j] > max)
00424                 max = _grid[i][j];
00425 
00426         }
00427     }
00428 
00429     return max;
00430 
00431 }

00433 
00437 void
00438 Image2D::
00439 expand() {
00440 
00441     Image2D newimage( _nxbins*2, _nybins*2 );
00442     int j,k;
00443     double newpix;
00444     double a,b, x,y;
00445     double t1,t2,t3,t4;
00446 
00447     // Stuff the new image with pixels from the old one, using
00448     // trilinear filtering
00449 
00450     for (int n=1; n<newimage.getYDim(); n++) {
00451         for (int m=1; m<newimage.getXDim(); m++) {
00452 
00453             // trilinear filter  
00454 
00455             x = m/2.0;
00456             y = n/2.0;
00457 
00458             j = static_cast<int>(  x  );
00459             k = static_cast<int>(  y  );
00460 
00461             if ((j<1) || (j>(getXDim()-3))  || (k<1) || (k>(getYDim()-3)) ) {
00462                 newpix = _grid[j][k];
00463             }
00464             else {
00465                 
00466                 a = x-j;
00467                 b = y-k;
00468                 
00469                 t1 = a*(1-a)*(1-a)*_grid[j-1][k-1] + 
00470                     (1 - 2*a*a+a*a*a)*_grid[j][k-1] +
00471                     a*(1 + a-a*a)*_grid[j+1][k-1] - 
00472                     a*a*(1-a)*_grid[j+2][k-1];
00473                 
00474                 t2 = -a*(1-a)*(1-a)*_grid[j-1][k]+
00475                     (1 - 2*a*a + a*a*a)*_grid[j][k]+
00476                     a*(1+a-a*a)*_grid[j+1][k]-
00477                     a*a*(1-a)*_grid[j+2][k];
00478                 
00479                 t3 = -a*(1-a)*(1-a)*_grid[j-1][k+1]+
00480                     (1 - 2*a*a + a*a*a)*_grid[j][k+1]+
00481                     a*(1+a-a*a)*_grid[j+1][k+1]-
00482                     a*a*(1-a)*_grid[j+2][k+1];
00483                 
00484                 t4 = -a*(1-a)*(1-a)*_grid[j-1][k+2]+
00485                     (1 - 2*a*a + a*a*a)*_grid[j][k+2]+
00486                     a*(1+a-a*a)*_grid[j+1][k+2]-
00487                     a*a*(1-a)*_grid[j+2][k+2];
00488                 
00489                 
00490                 newpix = -b*(1-b)*(1-b)*t1 + (1-2*b*b+b*b*b)*t2 +
00491                     b*(1+b-b*b)*t3 + b*b*(b-1)*t4;
00492                 
00493             }
00494 
00495             newimage.setPixel( m,n, newpix );
00496             
00497         }
00498     }
00499     
00500 
00501     // Now, copy the new image to the current one...
00502     
00503     _nxbins *= 2;
00504     _nybins *= 2;
00505     
00506     _grid.resize( _nxbins );
00507     for (int i=0; i<_grid.size(); i++) {
00508         _grid[i].resize( _nybins );
00509     }
00510     
00511     _xcoord.resize( _nxbins );
00512     _ycoord.resize( _nybins );
00513     
00514     for (int k=0; k<_nxbins; k++) {
00515         for (int l=0; l<_nybins; l++) {
00516             _grid[k][l] = newimage.getPixel( k,l );
00517         }
00518     }    
00519     
00520     // resize the coordinate boxes as well..
00521     setCoordinateBox( _minx,_miny,_maxx,_maxy );
00522     
00523 }

00534 Image2D* 
00535 Image2D::
00536 crossCorrelateWith( Image2D &image ) {
00537   
00538     register int i,j,k,l,m,n;
00539     double sum=0;
00540     
00541     
00542     if (image.getXDim() != _nxbins || image.getYDim() != _nybins ) {
00543         cout << "Image2d::crossCorrolateWith(): image dimensions don't match"
00544              << endl;
00545         cout <<"source: "<< _nxbins<<"x"<<_nybins
00546              <<" dest: "<< image.getXDim()<<"x"<<image.getYDim()<<endl;
00547 
00548         throw AnalysisException( "Image dims don't match!" );
00549     }
00550 
00551 
00552     Image2D *corr = new Image2D( _nxbins, _nybins );
00553     corr->setCoordinateBox( _minx,_miny, _maxx,_maxy );
00554     
00555     for (i=0; i<_nxbins; i++) {
00556         for (j=0; j<_nybins; j++) {
00557 
00558             // Calculate the C[i][j] correlation coefficient:
00559             
00560             sum=0;
00561             for (k=0; k<_nxbins; k++) {
00562                 for (l=0; l<_nybins; l++) {
00563                     sum += 
00564                         (getPixel( k,l )) *
00565                         (image.getPixel((k+i)%_nxbins,(l+j)%_nybins));
00566                 }
00567             }
00568 
00569             m = (i+_nxbins/2)%_nxbins;
00570             n = (j+_nybins/2)%_nybins;
00571 
00572             corr->setPixel(m,n,
00573                            sum/((double)(_nxbins*_nybins)));
00574         }
00575     }
00576 
00577     return corr;
00578 
00579 }

00585 void
00586 Image2D::
00587 getIndexOfMax( int &ii, int &jj ) {
00588     
00589     double max =-1e10;
00590 
00591     for (int i=0; i< _nxbins; i++) {
00592         for (int j=0; j< _nybins; j++) {    
00593             
00594             if (_grid[i][j] >= max) {
00595                 max = _grid[i][j];
00596                 ii=i;
00597                 jj=j;
00598             }
00599 
00600         }
00601     }
00602 
00603     assert(ii>=0 && ii<_nxbins);
00604     assert(jj>=0 && jj<_nybins);
00605 
00606     // now, (ii,jj) is the index of the max value
00607     
00608 }
